title: Infinite Design v2.5
description:
Infinite Design is a professional vector graphics app which lets you create complex and beautiful designs effortlessly on your mobile device.

Key Features:

- Infinite canvas (pan, zoom, or rotate)
- Infinite layers and unique layer options: split, merge, flip, duplicate, and perspective transformation
- Five types of symmetry: hoizontal, vertical, angular, radial, and kaleidoscopic
- Infinite undo and redo system
- A relative menu system designed for speed painting
- Import images from your gallery, camera, or the web
- Special Effects include four types of blurring, inner or outer shadowing, and embossing
- A fluid interface fully optimized for touchscreen devices
- Path editing and a unique pen tool
- Save as JPEG or PNG (with background or without background), or PSD
- Export images as large as 100 megapixels
- Export path data to SVG for editing in your favorite graphics editor 
- Export design to Infinite Painter
- NVIDIA DirectStylus support

What's New:

v2.5:
-Faster saving and loading
-Drag and drop layers or objects
-New color picker with automatic swatch of current colors in project
-New brush settings
-Added 195 default shapes
-Pressure sensitivity
-Long press undo to clear canvas
-Enhanced SVG support
-Assign functions to the finger or the volume keys
-Grids and grid snapping: standard, isometric, and radial
-Linked symmetry strokes
-Redesigned project gallery
-Transform frame
-Path smoothing
-Copy, cut, and paste system

More info:
